faq_library.library_purpose: Customer-facing FAQs for AI startup websites. Answers are written FROM the AI startup's perspective TO their customers, using extraction rules to personalize with the company's own data.

data_sources: Homepage (title, H1, hero section, meta description)
How it Works / Technology page (methodology, technical details)

confidence_thresholds.low: below 0.6 - Use fallback, log for manual review

global_extraction_notes.fallback_strategy: If extraction confidence is below threshold, use generic but accurate fallback that won't mislead customers. NEVER invent or hallucinate company-specific claims.

validation_rules.company_name: Must be found with 95%+ confidence or use 'Our company'
validation_rules.metrics: Must have numeric validation (1-100 for percentages, reasonable ranges for others)
validation_rules.compliance: Only include if explicitly stated on website - NEVER assume
validation_rules.timelines: Must be realistic and verifiable - use ranges if uncertain
validation_rules.customer_examples: Only reference if real case study exists - NEVER fabricate

anti_hallucination_rules.rule_1: If data isn't found on website, use generic fallback - NEVER create fake data
anti_hallucination_rules.rule_2: If metric isn't stated, say 'measurable improvement' - NEVER invent percentages
anti_hallucination_rules.rule_3: If compliance cert not found, say 'industry-standard security' - NEVER claim specific certs
anti_hallucination_rules.rule_4: If customer example not found, omit example - NEVER create fake customer stories
anti_hallucination_rules.rule_5: If timeline uncertain, use ranges or 'typically' - NEVER state fake specific durations

how_tool_uses_this: 1. Tool scans target AI startup's website
2. Identifies missing FAQs by checking for these questions on site
3. Runs extraction rules against website content to gather company-specific data
4. Validates confidence scores for each extracted element
5. Generates personalized FAQ answer using templates + extracted data
6. Falls back to generic version if confidence too low
7. Presents customized FAQ recommendation to user
8. Provides implementation code (HTML + Schema JSON-LD) ready to add to site
quality_assurance: Extraction confidence logging for manual review of low-confidence recommendations
Fallback usage tracking to identify patterns in missing data
A/B testing of template variations for different AI startup types
Customer feedback loop on recommendation quality and relevance
Regular template updates based on industry trends and customer needs
